= Amazoncouk Juice Extension =

Extension to launch a search window on Amazon.co.uk based on ISBN data held on page. Can be launched from either text or image based selection panels. 

== Example code ==
{{{
new amzcoukJuice(juice,
'http://library.corporate-ir.net/library/17/176/176060/mediaitems/109/a.co.uk_logo_RGB.jpg',
'Search Amazon.co.uk',
'new');
}}}

== Constructor arguments ==
{{{
arg: ju - instance of juice
arg: src - url to logo to display in selection panel
arg: text - text to display in selection panel
arg: launchType - type of widow to launch "new"(default) | "overlay" | "iframe" | "current" - optional
arg: insert1 - option for launch window - optional
arg: insert2 - option for launch window - optional
}}}
